page.title: 09CARDROSS _ ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: {SCHOOL SPORTS-}THE PRIMARY SCHOOL HOLDS ITS SPORTS ON THE PLAYING FIELDS ON AN EVENING IN JUNE, THUS ENABLING FAMILIES TO GO. HOT DOGS AND LEMONADE ARE SOLD BY MEMBERS OF STAFF AND PARENTS. {GALA DAY-}THE COMMUNITY COUNCIL RUNS THIS EVENT EACH SEPTEMBER. OFTEN LUCKY WITH THE WEATHER, 1985 WAS HIT BY THE WETTEST SUMMER SINCE RECORDS BEGAN. A DISCO IS HELD TO CHOOSE A GALA QUEEN. {AGRICULTURAL SHOW-}THIS EVENT IS STAGED IN MAY AT GEILSTON FARM BY THE DUNBARTONSHIRE SOCIETY. ANIMALS, CRAFTS, BAKING AND SIDE STALLS MAKE THIS A GOOD DAY OUT! IN THE SWRI TENT, "RURAL" MEMBERS TAKE PART IN SEWING, CRAFT AND BAKING COMPETITIONS.
